channel.title: Combind Client & Source (better topic then last 1)
channel.description:
My DrowningScape client don't workz if i Run the source it works but if i run Client i only say
H:\Documents and Settings\Brent\Bureaublad\DrowningScape Official Client(with.ja va)>java -Xmx500m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 java.io.IOException: Cannot run program "C:/Program Files/Mozilla Firefox/firefo x.exe": CreateProcess error=21, Het apparaat is niet klaar at java.lang.ProcessBuilder.start(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source) at Class51.actionPerformed(Class51.java:603) at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.AbstractButton$Handler.actionPerformed(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.fireActionPerformed(Unknown java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: CreateProcess error=21, Het apparaat is niet kla ar at java.lang.ProcessImpl.create(Native Method) at java.lang.ProcessImpl.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ProcessImpl.start(Unknown Source) ... 30 more java.io.IOException: Cannot run program "C:/Program Files/Mozilla Firefox/firefo x.exe": CreateProcess error=21, Het apparaat is niet klaar at java.lang.ProcessBuilder.start(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Unknown Source) at Class51.actionPerformed(Class51.java:603) at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ProcessImpl.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ProcessImpl.start(Unknown Source) ... 30 more
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . . = Press any key to continue. . .
En if i try to log in on Client it say's Error Connection To Server. (BTW i got no Firefox..)
